lom:description.lom:string:
"Much more satisfying than I ever expected, and the time easily fits into the day's work." Don L. Jewett, M.d., D. Phil., University of California San Francisco, MentorNet ACE Mentor"
This posting describes a terrific program to help electronically mentor future women faculty in science and engineering. More mentors are needed and I urge interested and qualified faculty consider this excellent opportunity.

lom:title.lom:string: Msg. #0593 MENTORNET: MENTORING FUTURE WOMEN FACULTY IN SCIENCE AND ENGINEERING
